text: Rua da Aurora is a street in the Brazilian city of Recife, capital of Pernambuco. It is located on the left bank of the Capibaribe River and, in its final stretch, on the right bank of the Beberibe River. It starts at Ponte da Boa Vista and ends at Ponte de Limoeiro, where Avenida Norte begins in Santo Amaro. It has this name because all its houses face east, the east.] == References == Category:Recife
title: Aurora Street (Recife)
